eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: New Mexico; AT 06:06 AM ON DEC 06, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:21 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
The Albuquerque Police Department is requesting your assistance in locating 7-year-old
Jaylah Trujillo and 1-year-old Omari Morgan. Both children were abducted by Duwayne
Morgan from 3618 Lafayette Dr NE. Duwayne and the children were last seen in a 2019 grey
Dodge Journey. Omari was wearing a grey t-shirt and black pants and Jaylah was wearing a
Lilo & Stitch shirt and blue jeans. If seen, call 911 or 505-242-2677.
